name: nimrod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very stupid person: What nimrod left the lid off the butter? Jimmy is a nimrod on all other issues, but he is correct on this point.
More examplesFewer examplesVictoria, please sack that nimrod.One day, this nimrod starts thinking: "Gee, I really wish there was a decent steak to be had somewhere in my town."Austin rolled his eyes. "You know what I mean, nimrod."
